item.title: Anhedonia
item.description: I try hard holding onto things that I’m losing I grieve for things that I didn’t have to begin with

item.title: At-last
item.description: So is this how it’s all gonna end? Silence and shy away with the tension in the air We lock out hearts, while we still pretend

item.title: Broken
item.description: You’re dead inside. But are you okay outside either!? Dead eyes with broken soul Wondering when you’ll meet her What am I even sad for?

item.title: Chaos
item.description: There’s me And there’s someone that I wanna be There’s you And between us, there’s this reality. It’s idiotic, How we wish, how we hope, how we feed our greed

item.title: Delusional
item.description: Our universe had always been different I was just only trying to merge them Our, whatever we had, has been like a sea shore

item.title: Hollow
item.description: I am living off those memories that we made I am yearning for more memories to be made I’m alone but I’ve got you in my mind

item.title: Poems
item.description: Chaos Broken Would you Why Words Snowmen Separate Anhedonia Uncertain Delusional Hollow At-last

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: Roadmap of this website make a blog site

item.title: Separate
item.description: Now we’ll forget about us as we slowly drift apart Lying to ourselves and ringing false alarms We’ll be the strangers that we’re longing to be

item.title: Snowmen
item.description: My mind… Why is it always in a cold place It’s snowing ashes of dark thoughts The weather in here is so uncertain

item.title: Uncertain
item.description: Why’s my fate so uncertain Why does always life has to happen I always feared the extremes of life I was content living a lie

item.title: Why
item.description: How insignificant i have become How little control i had over myself How everything felt magical one day How I was happy being in her grace

item.title: Words
item.description: Sometimes the words said by other person sticks in my brain Sometimes it reminds me of my insecurities But sometimes it makes me smile endlessly

item.title: Would you
item.description: I wonder if you care Does my slightest affect you in any way? Would you have felt anything? If i were to leave you the other day…
